line.originaltext: 8 lasagna noodles, uncooked
1 cup shredded reduced-fat Monterey Jack cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1 cup shredded reduced-fat Monterey Jack cheese")

line.originaltext: 1 (15 ounce) container part-skim ricotta cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "1 (15 ounce) container part-skim ricotta cheese")

line.originaltext: 1 (4.5 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 (4.5 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained")

line.originaltext: 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
1/8 teaspoon salt
2 cups drained canned no-salt-added black beans
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "2 cups drained canned no-salt-added black beans")

line.originaltext: Cooking spray
1 (15.5 ounce) jar no-salt-added salsa
Fresh cilantro sprigs (optional)
Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions, omitting salt and fat; drain well.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, , ing10, "cooked lasagna", "according to directions, no salt, not fat, drain well")

line.originaltext: Combine cheeses and next 3 ingredients, stirring well.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing11, "cheese mix", "stir well")

line.originaltext: Spread cheese mixture over one side of each noodle.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11}, ing12, "noodles and cheese", "spread on each noodle")

line.originaltext: Spoon black beans evenly over cheese mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing6}, ing13, "beans and cheese", "spoon evenly")

line.originaltext: Roll up noodles, jellyroll fashion, beginning at narrow ends.
Place lasagna rolls, seam sides down, in an 11- x 7- x 11/2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Place lasagna rolls, seam sides down, in an 11- x 7- x 11/2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Place lasagna rolls, seam sides down, in an 11- x 7- x 11/2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
To serve, spoon salsa evenly over rolls, and garnish with cilantro sprigs, if desired.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing8, ing9}, ing16, "food", "spoon salsa over rolls, garnish with cilantro")
